title: With Child Care Centers in Crisis, New York Pledges to Speed Payments
description: Child care providers and parents have grown frustrated over millions of dollars in delayed payments, and one major center is closing.
dc:creator: Emma G. Fitzsimmons and Troy Closson
media:credit: Laylah Amatullah Barrayn for The New York Times
media:description: Some New York City child care centers waited months to be paid by the city, adding strain to an already precarious industry and forcing at least one network of centers to close.
